original_title: Under The Grapefruit Tree: The CC Sabathia Story
overview: In his own words, Sabathia narrates his story. As the highs and lows of his last season are chronicled, Sabathia looks back on his legacy as one of the gameâ€™s pre-eminent pitchers, as well as the profound challenges that shaped him, including his longtime battle with addiction that came to a head in 2015 while playing for the Yankees.
title: Under The Grapefruit Tree: The CC Sabathia Story
